author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all. Passing `sum` by reference is not necessary, since `std::accumulate` updates `acc` automatically:

> Initializes the accumulator `acc` (of type `T`) with the initial value `init` and then modifies it with `acc = op(std::move(acc), *i)` for every iterator `i` in the range `[first, last)` in order. 

#### PR validation:

Code compiles
title: Fix TTDTC for CPP20
